actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Senate Committee on Banking discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to extend to the refinancing of mortgage loans certain protections of the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act and the Truth in Lending Act.

summary.text: Amends the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act to include refinancing of a loan in the definition of "federally related mortgage loan." Modifies requirements regarding when lenders must provide an informational booklet to residential real estate loan applicants.

titles.title: A bill to extend to the refinancing of mortgage loans certain protections of the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act and the Truth in Lending Act.
